msbt.message: Hey, I get it. You want to talk to me. But it's 's birthday! the star today.
Just look at the smile on 's face.This would be a great time for to get some professional headshots done.
Ah, I see you made the guest list for the big birthday bash as well It's not the most exclusive event on , but that's cool. We're all here to celebrate!
Hey, good to meet you! So, you're friends with , is that right? And you're ? Is that how you pronounce it?<10_4 /> Cool! My name's . Always fun to rub elbows with another of 's hippest, !
Good cake, good friends, and thoughtful yet expensive gifts You can't beat it! I mean, a strobe light or two would be nice, but this is still pretty cool.
Oh man, this is so much fun. Why can't it be someone's birthday every day?
The only thing I don't like about birthdays is getting older. So, why don't we get rid of that part? Do you think anyone would notice if I turned the same age for, oh, 10 years in a row?

So, did you get something cool for ?Pro tipâ€”it's not about what YOU like, it's about what celebrities like.Ha HA! I'm just kidding. You should give gifts that the recipient will love.And if a really cool celebrity also endorses it, that's just gravy on the cake!
Tell me What do you think of the decor in here?Before you say anything, you should know that and I worked on it together. OK, now hit me with the praise!
Have you given a gift yet?<10_4 /> What are you waiting for? I know like anything that you picked out, .
You can never spend too much time picking out the right birthday gift for someone. In fact, I've already started picking out just the thing for my friend's 80th birthday. He's 24 now.

You know what I always ask for for my birthday?Friendship. It really is the most important thing. A friend could give me an empty box and I'd be happy. Of course, I'm not the kind of guy to turn down a cashmere -neck sweater either.
Buongiorno, ! Remember me?It's ! Oh, I guess you could call me of as of now. Anyway, one of my duties here is to hype up parties, and it's 's birthday today.

Whoa, is that ? How about that!I can't believe how much has happened since the last time we met up. I live here now! AnduhI guess that's about it. Oh! But today is 's birthday. That's something! ActuallyI kinda crashed this party! The paparazzi loves it when celebs like me do that.
Heyyou're not a regular visitor to , are you?Well, that's exciting! You're here just in time for 's birthday bash! There's nothing better than crashing a stranger's birthday. Ask me how I know.
Talk about a VIP event. Not only is it 's birthday, it's Valentine's Day!
I have a gift for you!
That's right.
So it's 's birthday. But I feel like February 14th is big for some other reason too
Here's a valentine!
Hmm...
It's Valentine's Day and 's birthday at the same time!This is like when a dance party breaks out at restaurant. Two of my faves at once!
I also have a gift!
Sounds fun!
